headline: Should Northern Trust's (NTRS) Singapore Fund Mandate Change Investor Perception of Its Asia Strategy?
summary: Avanda Investment Management announced it is expanding its fund services relationship with Northern Trust to support its role in the Monetary Authority of Singapore’s Equity Market Development Programme, a SGD 5 billion (approximately US$3.8 billion) initiative to strengthen Singapore’s asset management ecosystem. This move highlights Northern Trust’s ability to win and scale multinational partnerships, underscoring its growing presence and credibility in key Asian financial markets. We'll...
